tabbar.js Script¶

generateTabButton(div, buttonText, callback)¶

Used to add buttons to the end of a particular HTML element

Arguments:
  • div (Object) – the element to add a button to
  • buttonText (string) – the text to display on the button
  • callback (buttonCallback) – the function to call for the ‘click’ event for the button
includeQueryStringScript()¶

Used to load a particular script based on a valid ‘tab’ query in the query string

defaultTabCallback(name)¶

Used as a lookup table for values of the “tab” query to javascript functions for button callback

Arguments:
  • name (string) – the name of the tab as per the “tab” query: expecting one of [“Voting”,”Rating”,”Tabs”,”Account”]
Returns:

string|buttonCallback – callback - the relevant callback function for the ‘name’ string if it matches one of the expected values, or the string “” if it doesn’t.
defaultTabCookies()¶

Used to ensure that a valid “tabs” cookie exists, and set the cookie to the default value if it doesn’t exist

supplyButtons(element, tableCallback)¶

Used to populate a HTML element with the ‘tab’ buttons needed depending on the values stored in the “tabs” cookie

Arguments:
  • element (Object) – the element to insert buttons into
  • tableCallback (tableCallback) – the lookup table for buttons to use
supplyTabButtons(elementname)¶

Convenience function used to populate the specified div element with the default tabs

Arguments:
  • elementname (string) – the id specifying the element to insert tabs into
